subject: Suite 3 Design Premium
body:
How inimitably graceful children are in general before they learn to dance!

Speak well of your enemies... you made them.

The minute a man ceases to grow, no matter what his years, that minute he begins to be old.

On the soft bed of luxury many kingdoms have expired.

Never stand begging for that which you have the power to earn.

Whatsoever one would understand what he hears must hasten to put into practice what he has heard.

The secret of language is the secret of sympathy and its full charm is possible only to the gentle.

Every harlot was a virgin once.

Nothing is more common than mutual dislike, where mutual approbation is particularly expected.

I never remember feeling tired by work, though idleness exhausts me completely.

The only way to have a friend is to be one.

The consequences of an act affect the probability of it's occurring again.

The older one grows, the more one likes indecency.
